definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
a good dog deserves a bone (idiom)

sentences.english: He is convinced that his poem will win the award.
sentences.chinese: 他深信自己那首诗会得奖。

sentences.english: Dennis:Hm, you were the youngest person ever to win it.
sentences.chinese: 你曾经是最年轻的得奖者。

sentences.english: Dry Creek Valley is well known for its sumptuous award-winning Cabernets.
sentences.chinese: 干溪谷以得奖无数的赤霞珠而闻名。

sentences.english: Winners of the Talent Maths Competition in Batam, Indonesia year 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年峇淡岛才能数学比赛之得奖者。

sentences.english: The Gross Champion will not be awarded any other Net prizes.
sentences.chinese: 获总杆冠军的得奖者将不获领发任何净杆奖项。

sentences.english: A certificate of merit will also be awarded to each winning participant.
sentences.chinese: 各得奖者将获颁发奖状一张。

sentences.english: The name of the winner of the drawing contest was to be announced at noon.
sentences.chinese: 那项绘画比赛得奖人的名字将于中午时分宣布。

sentences.english: The award for this year's best actress went to Mary.
sentences.chinese: 本年度最佳女演员奖的得奖者是玛丽。

sentences.english: Notification letter will be sent to individual winner for gift redemption.
sentences.chinese: 各得奖者将获专函通知有关領奖事宜。

sentences.english: All winners will be notified by post.
sentences.chinese: 我们将以书面通知所有得奖者。

sentences.english: A certificate of merit and a medal will also be awarded to each winning participant.
sentences.chinese: 各得奖者将获颁发奖状一张及奖牌一面。

sentences.english: But the prizewinners also have some quirks.
sentences.chinese: 然而得奖人也有一些怪癖。

sentences.english: Winning the prize was an added bonus.
sentences.chinese: 得奖是一个额外的收获。

sentences.english: Results and list of prizewinners will be announced by the organizer.
sentences.chinese: 主办单位保留最终投票结果及得奖名单之决定权。

sentences.english: Mobius Strip Lamp is a Red Dot Concept Design Award winning entry.
sentences.chinese: 莫比乌斯带灯是红点概念设计奖得奖作品。

definition: Golden Horse Film Festival and Awards
to determine the recipient of an award through discussion

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 Wen2 xue2 Jiang3

definition: to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals
Nobel Prize/abbr. for 諾貝爾獎|诺贝尔奖[Nuo4 bei4 er3 Jiang3]

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3
